TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageIndexConverter extends System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter

summary.span: 提供在图像索引数据与字符串之间实现互相转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于将的索引值与 其他数据类型之间的转换（通常为） 。The class is used to convert index values of an to and from other data types, typically . 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 基类和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 通常，您不会直接创建的实例 。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 请改为调用的 方法 。Instead, call the method of . 有关详细信息，请参阅基类中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型转换器只能将32位有符号整数对象与字符串相互转换。This type converter only can convert a 32-bit signed integer object to and from a string. `context`可用于提取有关从中调用此类型转换器的环境的其他信息。The `context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from. 这可能为 `null`，因此应总是对其进行检查。This may be `null`, so you should always check. 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object may also return `null`.

summary.span: 返回与指定的格式上下文相关联的图像列表的标准索引值集合。

returns.span: 包含标准有效索引值集的 。

span.span: A that holds a standard set of valid index values.

returns.span: 如果未找到任何图像列表，则此集合将包含值为 -1 的单个对象。

span.span: If no image list is found, this collection will contain a single object with a value of -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回与参数的属性关联的图像列表的索引值的集合 `context` 。Returns a collection of index values for image lists associated with the property of the `context` parameter. 如果 找不到，则将在此类列表中搜索组件的父对象。If an is not found, then the parent of the component will be searched for such a list. 通常，在 尝试使用和方法之前调用方法 。Typically the method is called to before an attempt is made to use the and methods.

span.span: if the method returns an exclusive list of valid values; otherwise, .
This implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果由方法返回的列表 为独占列表，则其他值都无效。If the list returned by the method is exclusive, then no other values are valid. 这是枚举数据类型的典型。This is typical of an enumerated data type. 如果列表不是独占的，则除了提供的标准值列表之外还有其他有效值 。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides. 在此类型转换器中实现时，此方法始终返回 `false` 。As implemented in this type converter, this method always returns `false`. 通常，在 尝试使用和方法之前调用方法 。Typically the method is called to before an attempt is made to use the and methods.
